"I enjoy studying in the study room.": "If you feel sick, you should go to the emergency room."

Guru sedang mengajar di ruang kelas.
"I enjoy studying in the study room.": "The teacher is teaching in the classroom."

Saat ini, kita akan makan di ruang makan.
"I enjoy studying in the study room.": "Right now, we will eat in the dining room."

Saat kamu masuk, silakan lepas sepatumu di ruang masuk.
"I enjoy studying in the study room.": "When you enter, please take off your shoes in the entrance."

Kami akan rapat di ruang rapat.
"I enjoy studying in the study room.": "We will have a meeting in the meeting room."

Pasien dapat menunggu di ruang tunggu hingga dipanggil.
"I enjoy studying in the study room.": "Patients can wait in the waiting room until they are called."

"I enjoy studying in the study room.": "I bought liquid soap at the store near my house."

Saya lebih suka sabun cair daripada sabun batang.
"I enjoy studying in the study room.": "I prefer liquid soap to bar soap."

"I enjoy studying in the study room.": "I often have a headache every day."
